title: AGENTS.md
text: lecture repository (e.g. lecture_i2ml) follows standard structure: Naming conventions: - Slide files: slides-<chapter>-<name>.tex (lectures use numbered prefixes, yet universal) - Chapters correspond slides/ subdirectories - Excluded directories: attic, rsrc, , figure, figure_man, backup - Excluded files: chapter-order*.tex, OLD-*, -*, TODO*
code: lecture_i2ml/ ├── slides/               # Source .tex files organized by chapter │   ├── ml-basics/ │   │   ├── slides-basics-data.tex │   │   ├── slides-basics-learner.tex │   │   ├── figure/       # Generated figures (from rsrc/ scripts) │   │   ├── figure_man/   # Manually created figures │   │   ├── rsrc/         # R scripts that generate figures │   │   └── Makefile      # One-liner: include ../tex.mk │   └── tex.mk            # Symlinked/copied from service/slides/tex.mk ├── slides-pdf/           # "Known good" PDFs for comparison ├── style/                # Synced from lecture_service/service/style/ ├── latex-math/           # Submodule from slds-lmu/latex-math ├── scripts/              # Synced from lecture_service/service/scripts/ ├── .github/workflows/    # Synced from lecture_service/service/.github/ └── Makefile              # Top-level targets (synced from service/)

title: AGENTS.md
text: Two detection methods: - regex: parses .tex source \includegraphics etc. Fast misses dynamic paths. - fls: reads .fls recorder files latexmk -recorder. accurate (respects comments, \iffalse conditionals). Requires prior make slides. - auto (default): uses fls .fls files exist, otherwise regex.
code: rsrc/*.R scripts  →  figure/*.png  →  slides-*.tex  →  .fls files (from latexmk)                           ↑                                    ↓                     audit_chapter() cross-references these to find:                     - orphaned figures (on disk, not in any slide)                     - missing figures (in slide, not on disk)                     - attic figures (in figure/attic/, informational only)

title: AGENTS.md
text: NEVER name custom beamer environments frame<digit> (e.g. frame2, frame3). triggers beamer’s internal frame parser causes cryptic “Use doesn’t match definition” errors. Bad: frame2, frame3, frame123 Good: framei, framev, myframe, customframe Root cause: \NewEnviron{frame2} defined, LaTeX creates internal macros including \frame2. Beamer’s parser scans \frame + digit patterns mistakes malformed frame command. conflict latent name manifests keyval processing involved (e.g. adding \define@key options). frame2 used work simple font-size passthrough broke alignment options added. see error: Check environment name matches frame<digit>. Rename use letters. Don’t debug keyval syntax — ’s issue.

title: Audit the script-figure-slide dependency chain for a chapter — audit_chapter
text: Performs comprehensive audit lecture chapter: Discovers scripts rsrc/, figures figure/, slide .tex files Parses slides find figures reference Optionally runs scripts tracks figures produce Cross-references identify orphaned figures, orphaned scripts, missing figures

title: Audit the script-figure-slide dependency chain for a chapter — audit_chapter
code: audit_chapter(   chapter,   lecture_dir = here::here(),   lecture = basename(lecture_dir),   pattern = "[.]R$",   timeout = 300,   run = TRUE,   method = c("auto", "regex", "fls") )

title: Audit the script-figure-slide dependency chain for a chapter — audit_chapter
text: chapter Character. Chapter directory name, e.g. "evaluation". lecture_dir Character. Path lecture directory. Defaults ::(), .e. project root. lecture Character. Lecture name display purposes. Defaults basename(lecture_dir). pattern Regex pattern filter scripts. Default "[.]R$". timeout Numeric. Per-script timeout seconds. Default 300. run Logical. TRUE (default), execute scripts. FALSE, perform static analysis (figure existence + slide references). method Character. detect figures slides reference: "auto" (default): Use .fls files exist slides, otherwise fall back regex. Best use make slides. "regex": Parse .tex source regex. Fast can miss dynamically constructed paths (e.g. \\foreach loops). "fls": Parse .fls recorder files latexmk. robust requires prior compilation (make slides). Errors .fls files missing.

title: Audit the script-figure-slide dependency chain for a chapter — audit_chapter
text: Invisibly: list components: scripts: data.frame scripts. Includes success, error_message, elapsed, figures_produced columns run = TRUE (NA otherwise). figures: data.frame figure files disk (figure/) figures_man: data.frame manually created figure files (figure_man/) slide_refs: named list mapping slide filenames figure/ references slide_refs_man: named list mapping slide filenames figure_man/ references orphaned_figures: character vector figure/ filenames (extension) used slide (excludes attic/ subdirectory) orphaned_figures_man: character vector figure_man/ filenames (extension) used slide (excludes attic/ subdirectory) attic_figures: character vector filenames figure/attic/ attic_figures_man: character vector filenames figure_man/attic/ orphaned_scripts: character vector script filenames succeeded produced figure used slide (NULL run = FALSE) failed_scripts: character vector script filenames errored execution (NULL run = FALSE) no_figure_scripts: character vector script filenames succeeded produced figures (NULL run = FALSE) missing_figures: data.frame columns figure slide figure/ files referenced slides disk missing_figures_man: data.frame columns figure slide figure_man/ files referenced slides disk missing_pkgs: character vector R packages required scripts currently installed
